entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Navigate to original source from metadata fails to handle documentation comments #57924
    17.1
  • Intellisense changes existing, correct variable to capitalized option with same name (record class parameters) #57923
  • IDE0064: False positive when all readonly fields of a struct are static #57920
  • Lambdas + custom delegate types + type inference = breaking change in C# 10 #57916

Closed

  • Introduce parameter is replacing one file with another file's contents #57781
    17.1
  • Add an option for decompiled view to have everything expanded #57931
  • CSharpRemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider error when refactoring in VS2022 #57919
  • [Flaky Test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit #57719
  • Flaky test: Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpFindReferences.FindReferencesToCtor #57552
    17.1
  • C# 9 => C# 10 upgrade causing CS0411 with an extension method #57630
    17.1
  • Convert to block scoped code fix produces incorrect output if namespace declaration is inside a ifdef #57564
    17.1
  • "Find All References"/"Go to implementation" blocks editing for a significant amount of time #41374
    Backlog
  • [SourceLink] Ensure embedded source is shown with the right encoding #57350
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test for unique FixIdDefinition exports #57933
    Area-IDE
  • Add IXamlEditAndContinueSolutionProvider for XAML Language Service #57932
    Area-IDE
  • Fix remove-unused-variable for top-level-statements #57930
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57926
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Require definite assignment of all fields if struct includes any field initializers #57925
    Area-Compilers
  • Unify representation of an implicit `Index` indexer over an array and non-array types. #57918
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Attempt to mark EqualityContract property accessor as not auto-implemented #57917
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • draft #57915
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • List-patterns: add a few tests and add HasValidate flag #57914
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57921
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fixes Introduce Parameter Replacing File Content Bug #57922
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify implementation of SourceGeneratedFileItemSource #57691
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge FixIdDefinition with the same name #57883
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57892
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not call IsFullyLoadedAsync from JTF #57813
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57908
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57893
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57894
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch go-to-impl to be entirely async/non-blocking. #57861
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix deadlock switching the project context dropdown #57833
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Tweak SemaphoreDisposer to null out the held semaphore #57831
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix deadlock during solution load #57829
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add back option to allow users to disable async lightbulbs #57808
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #57906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid eagerly running formatting or simplification for Extract Method #57838
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Port BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit to the new test harness #57738
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Properly support TableEntryNavigateEventArgs.ShouldActivate #57889
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle trivia better when converting to file scoped namespaces #57913
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [SourceLink] Use correct encoding for embedded text #57683
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Transform the GeneratorDriver even if the Compilation was GCed #57721
    Area-IDE
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ensure we cache the previous item when two items are considered equal #57888
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Unify the namespace for our FatalError type #57887
    Area-Compilers
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
